text: Make a Wish is Taiwanese Mandopop artist Vic Chou's, of boy band F4, debut Mandarin solo studio album. It was released on 11 January 2002 by Sony Music Taiwan. Sony Music Taiwan Make a Wish album info 11 January 2002. Retrieved 2011-03-27 Chou was the first of the F4 members to release a solo album. A second limited edition was released on 26 February 2002 Sony Music Taiwan Make a Wish (Limited Edition) album info 26 February 2002. Retrieved 2011-03-27 The track, "Make A Wish" is listed at number 76 on Hit Fm Taiwan's Hit Fm Annual Top 100 Singles Chart (Hit-Fm年度百首單曲) for 2002. HTIO Radio Hit Fm Annual Top 100 Singles Chart 2002 (#51 to 100) Retrieved 2011-04-16 The album was awarded one of the Top 10 Selling Mandarin Albums of the Year at the 2002 IFPI Hong Kong Album Sales Awards, presented by the Hong Kong branch of IFPI.IFPI Hong Kong 2002 IFPI Hong Kong Album Sales Awards winners list Retrieved 2011-04-19 ==Track listing== # "Make A Wish" # "愛在愛妳" Ài Zài Ài Nǐ (Love Loves You) # "求救專線" Qiú Jiù Zhuān Xiàn (Hotline For Help) # "破碎的眼淚" Pò Suì De Yǎn Lèi (Broken Tears) # "溫柔的晚安" Wēn Róu De Wǎn Ān (A Gentle Good Night) # "有我有你" Yǒu Wǒ Yǒu Nǐ (With Me And You) # "Loving You" # "心疼" Xīn Téng (It Aches My Heart) # "童話還不夠美好" Tóng Huà Hái Bú Gòu Měi Hǎo (Even Fairy Tales Are Not Good Enough) # "要不是愛上你" Yào Bú Shì Ài Shàng Nǐ (If It Were Not, For Loving You) ==References== ==External links== * Vic Chou discography@ Sony Music Taiwan Category:2002 debut albums Category:Vic Chou albums Category:Sony Music Taiwan albums
title: Make a Wish (Vic Chou album)
